text:
Help set up our direct ad sales (Remote)!

We're currently one of the leading women's health apps on the market and would like to create a direct ad sales effort. We'd like to reach out to potential advertisers and create custom advertising campaigns for them inside our app.

If you have direct sales experience, we'd love for you to contact us. Even if you don't have full-time availability, we'd love your help part-time as well.

Email lalalee9 at hotmail.com .
